concept.name: average
concept.definition: Average number of hits per at-bats

concept.name: at-bats
concept.definition: Number of at-bats (Does not include walks or Sacrifice Hits)

concept.name: total-bases
concept.definition: Calculated by hits + doubles + (triples times 2) + (home-runs times 3).

concept.name: bases-on-balls
concept.definition: Number of times batter was walked

concept.name: strikeouts-against
concept.definition: Number of times batter struck out

concept.name: left-on-base
concept.definition: Number of runners left on base

concept.name: left-in-scoring-position
concept.definition: Number of runners left on second and/or third base

concept.name: singles
concept.definition: Number of hits off of which batter advances to first base

concept.name: doubles
concept.definition: Number of hits off of which batter advances to second base

concept.name: triples
concept.definition: Number of hits off of which batter advances to third base

concept.name: home-runs
concept.definition: Number of hits off of which batter advances to home plate

concept.name: grand-slams
concept.definition: Number of home runs with bases loaded

concept.name: plate-appearances-per-home-run
concept.definition: Plate appearances per home run ratio

concept.name: sac-flies
concept.definition: Number of hits resulting in batter out which advance base runner(s)

concept.name: sac-bunts
concept.definition: Number of bunts resulting in batter out which advance base runner(s)

concept.name: grounded-into-double-play
concept.definition: Number of ground balls which result in batter and base runner outs

concept.name: moved-up
concept.definition: Number of times runner advances to another base

concept.name: on-base-percentage
concept.definition: Calculated as follows: (hits + bases-on-balls + hit-by-pitch) / (at-bats + bases-on-balls + hit-by-pitch + sac-flies)

concept.name: stolen-bases-caught
concept.definition: Number of times the runner was caught while trying to steal bases.

concept.name: hit-by-pitch
concept.definition: Number of times batter hit by pitch

concept.name: reached-base-defensive-interference
concept.definition: The number of times the player reached a base due to interference by the defense.

concept.name: on-base-plus-slugging
concept.definition: Calculated by adding on-base-percentage to slugging-percentage.

concept.name: plate-appearances
concept.definition: Calculated by adding at-bats, bases-on-balls, hit-by-pitch, sac-flies, sac-bunts, and defensive-interfance-reaches.

concept.name: hits-extra-base
concept.definition: Calculated by adding doubles, triples, and home-runs.

concept.name: interferences
concept.definition: Number of interference or obstruction calls

concept.name: era
concept.definition: Earned run average: Number of earned runs divided by number of innings pitched multiplied by nine

concept.name: inherited-runners-scored
concept.definition: Number of runners which a previous pitcher allowed on base which scored

concept.name: pick-offs
concept.definition: The number of times the pitcher caught a player trying to steal, before making the pitch.

concept.name: errors-hit-with-pitch
concept.definition: Number of times pitcher hits batter with pitch

concept.name: wins
concept.definition: Number of games pitcher has won

concept.name: losses
concept.definition: Number of games pitcher has lost

concept.name: saves
concept.definition: Number of games pitcher has saved

concept.name: holds
concept.definition: Number of games relief pitcher has held the lead

concept.name: relief-points
concept.definition: Formula for rating relief performances. 4 points for a tough save; 3 points for a save; 2 for a relief win; minus 2 for a relief loss and blown save.

concept.name: shutouts
concept.definition: Number of games pitched in which opposing team did not score

concept.name: games-finished
concept.definition: Number of games pitched to the end

concept.name: winning-percentage
concept.definition: Calculated by wins divided by (wins + losses).

concept.name: event-credit
concept.definition: Whether a pitcher has received credit for winning or losing the game. TBD. Controlled Vocabulary. (win|loss|save|blown-save|win-blown-save|loss-blown-save|hold-win|hold-loss)

concept.name: save-credit
concept.definition: Whether a pitcher has received credit for winning or losing the game. TBD. Controlled Vocabulary. (win|loss|save|blown-save|win-blown-save|loss-blown-save|hold-win|hold-loss)

concept.name: batters-at-bats-against
concept.definition: Number of batters faced who were credited with at-bats.

concept.name: double-plays
concept.definition: Number of times two runners thrown out at the base.

concept.name: triple-plays
concept.definition: Number of times three runners thrown out at the base.

concept.name: putouts
concept.definition: Number of times a fielder caught a fly ball for an out.

concept.name: assists
concept.definition: Number of plays in which a fielder throws a ball to another fielder for the out.

concept.name: errors
concept.definition: Number of plays in which a fielder committed an error, such as dropping a ball.

concept.name: fielding-percentage
concept.definition: A measure of fielding success. Calculated as follows: (putouts + assists) / (putouts + assists + errors).

concept.name: defensive-average
concept.definition: Rate a fielder turns a bill hit to their area into an out.

concept.name: errors-passed-ball
concept.definition: Number of times a catcher is faulted with letting a pitched ball go past.

concept.name: errors-catchers-interference
concept.definition: Number of times a catcher has improperly interfered with play.

concept.name: stolen-bases-against
concept.definition: Number of bases successfully stolen while this player was on the field.

concept.name: stolen-bases-caught-defense
concept.definition: Number of times a runner was caught while trying to steal bases while this player was on the field.

concept.name: stolen-bases-average-defense
concept.definition: Success rate for stealing bases while this player was on the field.

concept.name: innings-played
concept.definition: Number of innings played at the named position.

concept.name: games-played-position
concept.definition: Number of games played at the named position.
